website_summaries.verdict: The Razer Forge TV is so-so at everything, but not excellent at anything. It’s overpriced, and the user experience feels unfinished.
pros: Integration with the OUYA Android Gaming system provides access to unique mobile gaming titles
cons: hardware and software are buggy and often disrupt streaming

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased this with his money. We plugged it up and it took forever to boot up. Then we downloaded a racing game. Every time he tried to open the game it would kick him off. He tried another game and the same thing. We turned the unit off. When we tried to turn it back on it wouldn’t boot back up. The little dots on the screen just kept rolling around. We finally got tired of waiting and shut the system off and requested a refund. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: lrmom

customer_reviews.title: Ditch stock firmware, install the custom ROM!!
customer_reviews.text: Is it good with the stock firmware right out of the box? Probably not. Is it buggy and restrictive with the stock firmware right out of the box? Probably. Fortunately, I have no knowledge of either because I plugged it in, updated stock firmware to Marshmallow and then installed the custom Adoptable Mi Rom by gabrielgagz v1.2 (google it or look on the razer insider site) Is it stable, unlocked, rooted and beast now? 100% yes! Not worth the $100+ asking tag from some sellers, but if you find a deal like I did ($40) it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not buy this, until it has some major updates.  Not ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this not support Netflix, the top streaming app, but when I did try streaming a show that worked fine on my Roku 3, I started getting artifacts and stuttering of the stream. It has to be a software issue, as the hardware shouldn't have had this problem Switched back to my Roku 3 for now, no problems with it. I plan on trying out an NVidia Shield. The Razor was not ready for release. They probably made the mistake of trying to get it out before NVidia's.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Green

customer_reviews.title: 2017 update amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 love them 2017 update and it's amazing Netflix support Google play store and Kodiak in appstore beautiful box modern combat 5 plays like a dream
customer_reviews.author: reyna

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product, Terrible Service.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible Product, Terrible Service. - No Netflix App (isn't this on everything else?) - No PC Streaming Date yet... - No functionality for Expanding Storage - Latest Update just bricked my device. Can't perform a hard reset. These are all razer problems, not Android TV.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money on something better!
customer_reviews.text: Item was returned within the first 30 minutes of owning it. The only media streaming app that is compatible with the device is Hulu which is not helpful. Yes I have a Hulu account but I also have Netflix, Dish Anywhere as well as a few others. Razer definitely should have chosen a different release date until the software and other features were worked out. Most likely will not purchase it again, at least not until the reviews turn around.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works ok don't like the remote and very hard to side load apps
customer_reviews.author: Cet

customer_reviews.title: Good reviews are not getting the point. This is a bad product.
customer_reviews.text: All these even half way good reviews are missing on major feature. I didn't buy the razer forge to play stupid android games. I purchased it to stream from my gaming pc to my living. A feature they never delivered on! Not having Netflix is an issue too but they didn't hold to their promise people. I feel like I was lied to. Already returned it after months of waiting for this feature. Razer as a company went down a couple notches for me. They never delivered on so much!
customer_reviews.author: Davidthomp

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Going to return and replace with NVIDIA SHIELD. No Netflix is really a killer & SHIELD beats this spec wise across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing spectacular
customer_reviews.text: It's August 15, 2015. 4.5 months after release and Netflix is still not available on the device. The Serval controller eats batteries and lacks responsiveness that cheaper controllers. The separate smartphone needed for entering characters on the screen is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Swint

customer_reviews.title: Super SRS <sadface>
customer_reviews.text: What a shame. I won't go through the laundry of disappoint with this product. All the other reviewers seem to have that down already. What bothered me more than anything was that this device was specifically designed to Not allow certain applications and the ability to even hook it up to your computer. Now my unit is a brick. We'll see how much fun it's going to be to try and return this POS to Razer. Shame you on Razer...
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: does not support netflix. Had I known that I would not have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P.

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all. This does nothing that I'm unable to do with my phone. Until there is a hack that allows for more content it is completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: John Ponton

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the trouble, don't purchase this item.
customer_reviews.text: This system is terrible. This system is mainly for gaming, and the controller has a lag which makes gaming frustrating. Ad says your favorite apps, yeah right. You can't download hardly any good apps, you can't even download Netflix or Amazon to stream shows.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for an android tv experience.
customer_reviews.text: This device had a lot of potential, but was poorly executed by Razer. Lack of Netflix is inexcusable. Also the serval controller is poorly made. The joysticks have no weight or feel to them. The buttons are cheap. The input lags terribly. Maybe Razer will learn their lesson and put out a quality product next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really?!? No Netflix support! Cheap build quality
customer_reviews.text: No Netflix is an embarrassment for Razer. The box and controller feel cheap which I'd be OK with but since this box doesn't even have Netflix support it's going straight back. I'll stick with my Chromecast. The controller is not worth the additional $50 over the box. It feels like a $25 or $30 controller. I was expecting something closer to an XBox 360 controller. If this is how Razer makes their products and software, I won't be purchasing anything from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Choate

customer_reviews.title: Very bad choice. Go for other stuff like apple's tv ...
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing device. Slow reaction of the game pad. Awful app for mobile. very short amount of apps. no browser, no netflix, well... not nothing that you may want... Very bad choice. Go for other stuff like apple's tv or asus nexus player.
customer_reviews.author: Sjusto

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Will be sending this back. Just read the other reviews. I feel the same. I was so looking forward to this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parker

customer_reviews.title: terrible email only support
customer_reviews.text: Awful, terrible email only support. Controller will not wake system up, have to reboot. BACK IT WENT
customer_reviews.author: Richard Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Better then the nexus player. However I wish I had a remote with it. Don't like using my phone as the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Murray

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just another rushed Android Box that was released before it was ready.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: The Forge is awesome, It has been one of the funnest devices ...
customer_reviews.text: The Forge is awesome, It has been one of the funnest devices I have had to work with in recent history and I enjoy its capabilities. Although I love this device it does have some problems, there is not a lot of documentation available on the device so I struggled doing exactly what I wanted but most functions are doable one way or another. As time goes on I am sure there will be more resources and more support but I would say its definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Huber

customer_reviews.title: be/e6rcLs92WHE It has one of the best packaging I've seen in a while Beats audio got ...
customer_reviews.text: It has one of the best packaging I've seen in a while Beats audio got the best packaging for consumers to date. This unit can hold a good stream from KODI and other streaming programs and play a few games made for TV. Hope tablet games will break pass that TV mode. Need to play my favorite games sometime.
customer_reviews.author: geo

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a pretty good android tv box
customer_reviews.text: Very nice android tv box, got mine for 50 dollars new with the razer serval controller. The controller's face buttons are a little bit clicky and feel cheap but I am very happy with the razer forge tv bundle. Great for kodi and emulation!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua stewart

customer_reviews.title: Broken garbage
customer_reviews.text: Their bluetooth chip doesn't work. A few times a day it "crashes", which means that all bluetooth devices stop working simultaneously. The only way to fix it is to reboot the device and lose any unsaved work. The system as a whole will freeze up solid (you can tell the difference between this and a bluetooth crash because the screen freezes up as well). All in all, a shoddy product and a waste of money. I'm sorry I ever trusted Razer enough to buy one of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Stenerud

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Price
customer_reviews.text: They bought Ouya and created ForgeTV. It went from $99 to $175! Why would anyone want to waste that kind of money for features you get on PC? You have to order on a PC, so you are just throwing money out the window on this device. The only way I would have a Forge TV is if Razer Inc sent me a free one as it isn't worth the price to get.
customer_reviews.author: C. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Razer needs to add expandable storage. Better than the Roku.
customer_reviews.text: Razer if making a huge mistake with not unlocking the capabilities of expandable storage. Honestly I can say unless they do they not even close to the Nvidia Shield TV. 16GB is not enough for a gaming machine android or not. Glad they are keeping the Ouya store alive by switching it to Cortex. (Which is why I give it the 4 stars.) My final thoughts on this right now unless they open expandable storage look at this as a better stream box for cord cutters than the Roku. But if you want a gaming android TV device spend/save the extra money and buy the Shield TV.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. I dreamt about doing lot of things with this but it is very limited. I got punished trusting the reputation of razer. I have played around the apq8084 development board with snapdragon 805 and was amazed to see this stupid product with so many limitations. 5 percent of apps that I own are compatible. OTG port is nowhere to be seen. Planning to return this item along with the controller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Empty Promises
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be the ultimate product. I loved my Nexus Player, but I returned it once I found out this was going out. I bought it from RazerZone. I used it for awhile, and I just can't deal with no Netflix. Plus, the Bluetooth on the Serval Controller keeps disconnecting. I still haven't heard back from the Razer Customer Support on returning the product, and I emailed on Saturday or Sunday.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Step Away!
customer_reviews.text: I own the Apple TV, MX3, and the OUYA. I gladly pick all 3 before this. It isn't polished, and sadly isn't worth the price. I am only interested in using it for XBMC/KODI, but this doesn't even do that right. I will wait for Nvidia's Android TV, that's the one ring to rule them all so far. NVIDIA EVEN OFFERS A CONTROLLER THAT WORKS RAZOR!
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Rushed product...
customer_reviews.text: Was not ready for prime time. Does not support DTS, no Netflix and limited apps. The most annoying thing was the remote app, every time the forge went into standby it would disconnect and the remote would need to connect again using BT. Stock android app worked a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Chan

customer_reviews.title: refer to nexus player reviews
customer_reviews.text: It's just stock Android TV. I was assuming there would be something more. Its effectively a Google Nexus Player with an ethernet port, full sized usb, no remote. The iOS remote app isn't out yet and it updated to Android 5.0.2, while the nexus player just went to 5.1.1. Anyway, hoping Google I/O has better news for Android TV. In the meantime, I've reverted back to using FireTV, and am waiting for the nvidia shield console.
customer_reviews.author: brains-N-brawn

customer_reviews.title: Just A Prototype
customer_reviews.text: Haha wow talk about a beta product. Even nightly custome roms work better then this. Hardware is amazing but the software is very limited for now. NOT A FINISHED PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Mikepopo99

customer_reviews.title: $150 paperweight
customer_reviews.text: PC Streaming unavailable still over more than a month past it's launch. No Netflix. Extremely limited app selection. Software itself is buggy. Are you KIDDING?? The back end, build quality, polish is all there, but it's essentially a pretty Apple TV with no features at all.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Stueve

customer_reviews.title: This is a JOKE of an Android TV box ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a JOKE of an Android TV box. It has so much potential with the hardware but Razer seems to be holding it back. the Android TV OS is quite limiting and I wish they would consider letting Android developers improve it and install a regular build of Lollipop with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ward

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: The Forge is not ready for prime time. No Netflix, No Cortex Game Streaming, and I couldn't get DTS or Dolby Digital to work with Kodi. Take a look at the Zotac BI320 if you want Steam game streaming, Kodi, Netflix, and DTS/DD audio.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Random Canadian Guy

customer_reviews.title: I returned it and purchased a G Box Q
customer_reviews.text: What can i say that hasnt been said already!I returned it and purchased a G Box Q.The RAZOR IS NOT READY FOR THE PUBLIC.Im not saying it wont be in the future,but at this point nah. hell to the nahh.I WAS BEING NICE WHEN I GAVE IT A TWO STAR.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Clark

customer_reviews.title: Bungle
customer_reviews.text: I looked at video reviews and the reviews here. This product is obviously junk at this time. Absolute garbage. I assume that updates are planned to fix the issues. It would really be a re-release since this worse than rushed, it's incomplete and as such it's just a bad joke. This needs a major software re-write to be worth considering.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Wise

customer_reviews.title: It's actually good!
customer_reviews.text: I don't get why all the bad reviews. The console is actually quite good, does very well on top-end android games and even connects like a charm to additional controllers. I haven't had any problems at all with this device. It's true it doesn't work with Netflix but it's something in the works and also if you already have a Roku or another streaming device this isn't a deal breaker. It's a very good console overall but you can't compare it to a PS4 or an Xbox One, so if that's your expectation this nor the Shield will help you with it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what all of these negative reviews are ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what all of these negative reviews are about ... It does exactly what I expect it to. I got all of the old console emulators loaded on here and even loaded Popcorn Time onto it and am able to watch movies. If I were to say anything negative its that a lot of apps aren't made for Android TV yet so if you sideload them they may have issues with UI.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Reedy

product_meta.title: Razer Forge TV Bundle
product_meta.description: Razer Forge TV was built to bring hard-core gaming and entertainment to the big screen. Forge TV opens the gateway for next-level Android gaming that is designed for the serious gamer. Intense Full HD graphics combined with the Razer Serial controller provide the detail and precision that is needed to dominate the living room.
feature_bullets: Android Gaming in your Living Room
